# Status values for connection

This document outlines the status values for connection, including active and inactive states.

The image below is the view based on the status values for the connection:![](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/9ede38a4-91d8-4f8e-8b8f-3a1146d0672a?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..CySS9iFoGxv-e9ZCZlR302eFDvzuHhsAjtdUxF8wmMI)

1.  Active: The tenant is active.

2.  Inactive: The connection between the tenant and Zuoraâ€™s enterprise is inactive or de-provisioned.
